title: Costco Stock Is Falling After the Retailer Reported Lighter Sales Growth
text:
Costco Wholesale stock was falling after hours, following the retailer’s fiscal fourth-quarter earnings report, which saw sales come in lighter than expected.

The back story. Costco stock (ticker: COST) has jumped 42% this year, more than double the S&P 500’s gains, and well ahead many of its fellow retailers. The discounter has received plenty of analyst praise, including leading up to Thursday’s report. The company’s recent sales results have been strong, it is expanding overseas, holding its own in the grocery space,...
description: Costco said it earned $2.69 a share on revenue of $47.5 billion in its fourth quarter. Analysts were looking for EPS $2.55 on revenue of $47.7 billion. Comparable sales rose 5.1% in the quarter.
